evidence.claim: Succeed Management Solutions handles HIPAA compliance as part of their services.
The company supports X12 EDI transactions for healthcare billing and insurance verification.
References to FHIR standards are found in their integration documentation.
Integration with EHR systems mentioned in their product descriptions.
The company utilizes cloud services for their platform, though specific providers are not mentioned on their main site.

icp.icp_reason: Company works with X12 and HIPAA; likely automates EDI processes.
